Name: Block Breaker 2
About the game: Block Breaker 2 - Sequel to an exciting puzzle game with many challenging levels and beautiful graphics. There are many unique blocks and levels waiting for you in the game, so try to beat them all! You have to go from start to finish, solving interesting puzzles! Whether you can go this way is up to you. Game Features: - Lots of levels - Convenient control - Physics - Colorful graphics
